name: Gradien (game jam)
description:
(this game IS sorta ready! I'm still working on it, but its in a fully playable state now, please give any feedback and comments, to help it grow, I will upload the final build at 10 hours before the Jam ends)

(controls)

-WASD for movment Q and E for turning

X for inventory

C for interacting with stuff.

If u want to play and see what it's like so far then go for it, but note the proper release be on the last day of the dungeon crawler(the 7th of April allowing for a day of playing and doing quick bug fixes) game jam.

You play as a knight called gradion! Sent by the king of aradon to vanquish a looming threat in a fortified cave near town, as you go through, you'll find strange and interesting things, including this strange world called flipside!

The combat wont be your standard turn based either, real time reaction based combat, speed and quickness is a need to take down any foe!

----first party stuff

-Pixel art;  all me

-Music; all me

-code; all me

---- third party stuff

-UI by; Ian Eaborn

-Text font by; Polyducks 

-sounds by;  Ivy sounds

-wall ceiling and floor textures by Dall E AI

https://itch.io/jam/dcjam2023 (game being made for this game jam!)
